title: OpportunityWasted
author: OpportunityWasted
content: Can somebody please help me with $10 worth of BNB on the Binance Smart Chain?I will repay $15 tomorrow morning.I need the funds to attempt to get an airdrop.Successful or not I will repay $15 tomorrow morning.I am on income assistance and am expecting $1300 CAD in my account tomorrow morning.Worst case scenario income assistance screws me around and you have to wait a day or two for your $15Absolute worst case scenario you lose $10 which wouldn't hurt too much.Anyway I know this is a new account and this is my first post but the amount I'm asking for is small enough that you would not be harmed if I'm just some shoddy scammer. I can even send you a picture of me holding my Canadian Photo ID if that will make you more comfortable.DM me if you'd be willing to provide this small sum loan.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Well, well, well, a Brand new account asking for a loan? Nice try, buddy! But sorry, I think you might be a bit too green to get any takers here. You see, it's like the old saying, "you have to have money to make money." In this case, you need to have some reputation on the forum to get a loan. Better luck next time, OpportunityWasted!

I can even send you a picture of me holding my Canadian Photo ID if that will make you more comfortable.DM me if you'd be willing to provide this small sum loan.No one will give you a penny for the reasons mentioned in the quote above.Begging for money is not allowed in this forum.$10 is a very small amount whatever the country you live in. Why you don't get a job and earn it !!Btw, don't believe in any airdrop that required you to deposit any amount of money.I like your username

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: OpportunityWasted on April 18, 2023, 05:29:03 PMI need the funds to attempt to get an airdrop.Sound like a scam.  99.99% of the time anyone asks you to deposit money with the promise of giving you more money, they are banking on your greed and simply running off with your money. Quote from: OpportunityWasted on April 18, 2023, 05:29:03 PMI am on income assistance and am expecting $1300 CAD in my account tomorrow morning.Why not just wait until tomorrow?Quote from: OpportunityWasted on April 18, 2023, 05:29:03 PMAbsolute worst case scenario you lose $10 which wouldn't hurt too much.Given the track record of "newbies asking for non-collateralized loans" on this site, this is the most likely scenario.  Not to mention, $10 is a week's worth of groceries in some countries and your attempt to minimize the amount doesn't exactly make you look honest.
